clues: I am old.
I have grey hair.
I invented electricity.
I am the 45th president of the United States.
I am known for my weird hair.
I am a business mogul.
I can be weak or strong.
I am used around the world.
Sometimes I get creamed.
I am a popular ice cream flavor.
Sometimes I'm a real drip.
Some people want me to take my lumps.
I can be made in an instant.
When I'm dark brown, I'm black.
Lose your turn.
I'm not beer, but I can be brewed.
Unlike money, I grow on trees.
I make people nervous.
I start life as a bean.
A cake is named for me.
I am a type of table.
Although you don't smoke me, I often need a filter.
I am a part of a morning ritual.
One free guess.
My breaks don't need to be fixed.
I am mostly water.
